body: I don't think I've made one in a while, so ask away!
body_tagged: I don't think I've made one in a while, so ask away!
title: Peaches' AMA

replies.body: What's your favourite in game nickname?
replies.body_tagged: What's your favourite in game nickname?

replies.body: Do you like Dubstep? ;p
replies.body_tagged: Do you like Dubstep? ;p

replies.body:
Woo! Thank god I have a document for all these questions xP

1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?
replies.body_tagged:

6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?

replies.body:
Hmm.

From anyone: Peaches
From the nicknames you give me: Peachybear

replies.body: Am I pretty?
replies.body_tagged: Am I pretty?

replies.body:
So many :o

Well,

@Princezz I do!

@goldie

1. Royal blue. It's just a really happy color in my opinion.
2. Right now, pretty much for me to get much better things for gaming. I use a 7 year old mac for crying out loud xD
3. 42
4. Yes, 2.33 repeated.
5. Indeed it is!
6. I would be brussel sprouts because no one eats those, so I could live.
7. I would use shampoo so I could blind them temporarily and run away.
8. I would be a poisonous snake. Mainly because many humans are scared of snakes, so I would just use my power to turn into a snake if I ever find that I need to defend myself and I can't take on the life form that I am facing.


@Franken

Yes :o


@Roman

1. Blue, as stated above.
2. 9
3. Probably steak
4. You didn't put an apostrophe in What's and you didn't capitalize the O in out.
5. I'd say about a 97-98. I would be modest, but I want to be honest in my AMA. I'm not sure how others feel about me as a mod.
6. Since December 2012/January 2013.
7. Of course!
8. Yes :D


@Sli
Yes, yes, and yes!

@AwesomeGirl
All of them!


@Adrian 

Ofc <3

So many :o

8. Yes :D

replies.body:
Do you remember me?

We do kinda go way back :/
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
@Evo
Because I like peaches :c

@DiamondAwarriorVenom
Yes, he is!

@cinammon
1. Yes
2. Well, I was introduced to it by my IRL friend Maniacmagee in January of 2013 (MC Zone).  Everyone is nice, the gamemodes are amazing, and the staff are great. The person that made me love it so much has to be izjust4fun. The day I saw him, I said "I want to be just like that guy". At that time, iz was Admin on MC Zone. 
3. Usually I do, but there are some times where I hate it so much.
4. Why not? :o
5. Much

@Sweg Turtle

k

@Splade

It's actually part of my name. 


@Kev
Of course I do :D
